Articles.Content:
What do you think??

Edited November 12, 2019 by Space boy
Yes. Take it to the poles for some extreme off roading.
My reflex is let it live. But then there's this argument against that, https://xkcd.com/695/
let the poor thing live it never did you any harm
Well as long as you can prevent the following: https://xkcd.com/1504/

Let it live.

That way it can always be used for a future mission at some point.

Depends on what you are using it for. Are the batteries dead and you are stuck in a way where you can't recharge them? Are the Science- y bits broken? Is it a waste of time to gather more science because the bonuses have worn off? More context is needed. If you believe you can still get lots of science, than don't. If it has become useless and cannot serve it's function any longer, murder it.

If you have decided to murder it, don't be boring and simply terminate it. Take some massive parts, build a space nuke, and bombard it from orbit. Or throw it off a cliff. Or land a new rover on top of it. If you decide to go through with it, we need a video.

Edited November 13, 2019 by Kernel Kraken

I always rename the unrecoverable probes from acomplished missions to "debris" and let it be.

If one day I need them again and the piece of garbage semi new robot is still there I reactivate it, so...

Spoiler

 

Edited November 13, 2019 by airtrafficcontroller

Hibernate mode and forget about it.  I use those old rovers/probes for the occasional "gather science from surface/space around x" contracts.  Pick up the contract, hop on the old rover, grab a temperature reading for 0 science, transmit, complete contract.  Quick $.
You might find a use for it later.
Three biomes is too few
Well, I use this mod that I forgot the name of, and it drives the rover for me whilst I do my stuff e.g launch a jool  mission. It’s cool
Retrieve it and place it on display at the KSC.  There are no other viable options.  You must do this.

LADIES AND GENTLEMEN!!!

GET READY FOR CHAOS AND CARNAGE LIKE YOU'VE NEVER SEEN BEFORE!!

DUNA DEMO DERBY!!

THERE'LL BE CRASHES! *crash sounds*

THERE'LL BE BASHES!! *bash sounds*

BUT ONLY IF YOU GET YOUR TICKETS TO THE ARENA!!

SUNDAY!! SUNDAY!! SUNDAY!!

 

Tickets available at Ticketmaster or your local vendor.
